result.execSummary:
The defendant Keith Allen Roberts was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Theft-Movable Property <=$2500 [Modifiers: Penalty-Theft if Value <=$2500], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Keith Allen Roberts

civilJdgmts.propDescr:
STATE OF WISCONSIN FOR UNPAID MONROE COUNTY RESTITUTION OWING AS FOLLOWS:

     D.KAST, SPARTA - $130.00

PLUS A RESTITUTION SURCHARGE OF $13.00 AND COURT COSTS OF $253.00 OWING TO MONROE COUNTY FOR A TOTAL JUDGMENT OF $396.00.

(FOR FURTHER INFORMATION SEE MONROE COUNTY CASE 15CM267)

miscConds.notes: Defendant to pay restitution of $130.00 plus 10% restitution surcharge of $13.00.

Defendant to undergo AODA assessment and follow through with any treatment and/or counseling recommended.

Comply with any other assessments, conditions and no contact orders deemed appropriate by agent.

No consumption or possession of alcohol.  No entering taverns, bars or liquor stores for any purpose.

No consumption or possession of any controlled substances without a valid prescription in own name and take exactly as prescribed.

No possession of drug paraphernalia.

May not be present where controlled substances are illegally sold or consumed.

May not have contact with known drug dealers, known drug users or their residences.

Defendant to pay supervision fees as determined by the Department of Corrections.

DEF PRESENT W/O ATTY - COURT QUESTIONS DEF REGARDING RIGHT TO ATTORNEY - DEF WAIVES RIGHT TO ATTY - PLEA GUILTY TO CT 1 - FOUND GUILTY - SENTENCE WITHHELD AND PLACED ON 12 MONTHS PROBATION W/CONDITIONS
VICTIM NOTIFICATION WORKSHEET WITH ATTACHED RESTITUTION REQUEST AND VICTIM IMPACT FORM
DEFENDANT APPEARS IN PERSON WITHOUT COUNSEL, ADJOURNED

Defendant appears in person without an attorney.  Court waives attorney only for the limited purposes of having a Pretrial Conference with the District Attorney's Office.  Court advises of charges and penalties and enters Not Guilty for the defendant.
Pretrial Conference- June 22, 2015 @ 1:30 p.m.
Plea/Schedule- July 13, 2015 @ 9:00 a.m.

Defendant appears in person without an attorney.  Court advises of charges and penalties and the right to an attorney.  Court refers defendant to Public Defender's Office.  Court orders $1,000 Signature Bond with conditions.
Adjourned Initial Appearance- June 8, 2015 @ 9:00 a.m.

No contact with D. K. or her residence.
No controlled substance without a valid prescription in own name.
